typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AcquiredCompanyPersonID as string,
		AddressBookDifferentiatorName as string,
		AddressBookTitleDesc as string,
		AlternateEmail as string,
		BuildingID as integer,
		BusinessFullName as string,
		BusinessLastName as string,
		EmailName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		FullName as string,
		GDPRActionInd as string,
		LastName as string,
		LocalLanguageFirstName as string,
		LocalLanguageLastName as string,
		LocationAreaCode as string,
		LocationAreaDetail as string,
		LocationCity as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		MobileBldgAssociationID as integer,
		OrgProject as string,
		PersonnelAreaCode as string,
		PersonnelNumber as integer,
		PersonnelSubAreaCode as string,
		PersonStatusCode as string,
		PreferredFirstName as string,
		RoomNumber as string,
		SecondLastName as string,
		SuffixName as string,
		USCitizenGCHolderInd as string,
		UseBusinessLastNameInd as string,
		WorkFaxNbr as string,
		WorkPhoneNbr as string,
		MSAspireInd as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> HC01Person
source(output(
		BuildingAccessInd as string,
		CompanyCode as string,
		CompanyEffDate as timestamp,
		CostCenterCode as string,
		CSConsecutiveAssignmentDaysQty as integer,
		CSDaysAvailableQty as integer,
		CSDurationWorkDays as integer,
		CSMaximumEndDate as timestamp,
		EarliestReturnDateExt as timestamp,
		JobNumber as integer,
		JobTitleName as string,
		MaximumEndDateExt as timestamp,
		NetworkAccessInd as string,
		PersonnelNumber as integer,
		PolicyCalcStartDateExt as timestamp,
		PositionEntryDate as timestamp,
		PositionFromDate as timestamp,
		PositionName as string,
		PositionNumber as integer,
		ReportsToEmailName as string,
		ReportsToFullName as string,
		ReportsToPersonnelNbr as integer,
		StaffingResourceTypeGroupCode as string,
		StandardTitle as string,
		StandardTitleNumber as integer,
		TimeAvailableExt as integer,
		TimeUsedExt as integer,
		MonthsAtStandardTitle as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> HC01PersonPosition
HC01PersonPosition select(mapColumn(
		CompanyCode,
		PersonnelNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> HC01PersonPositionProjection
